body:
Yup, there is a small function cgoEnabled (?? From memory) in cmd/dist
which determines the effective value of CGO_ENABLED. One of the parameters
is if GOHOSTARCH != GOARCH.

On Wed, 16 Sep 2015 07:33 Keith Randall <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Ah, that makes sense. Compiling 386 on amd64 counts as cross-compiling.
